mil3.3.4:1.2: “bhante nāgasena, atthi keci saṅkhārā, ye jāyantī”ti?
mil3.3.4:1.5_0: “Cakkhusmiñca kho, mahārāja, sati rūpesu ca cakkhuviññāṇaṁ hoti, cakkhuviññāṇe sati
mil3.3.4:1.5_1: cakkhusamphasso hoti, cakkhusamphasse sati vedanā hoti, vedanāya sati taṇhā hoti,
mil3.3.4:1.5_2: taṇhāya sati upādānaṁ hoti, upādāne sati bhavo hoti, bhave sati jāti hoti, jātiyā
mil3.3.4:1.5_3: sati jarāmaraṇaṁ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā sambhavanti, evametassa kevalassa
mil3.3.4:1.6_0: Cakkhusmiñca kho, mahārāja, asati rūpesu ca asati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ na hoti, cakkhuviññāṇe
mil3.3.4:1.6_1: asati cakkhusamphasso na hoti, cakkhusamphasse asati vedanā na hoti, vedanāya asati
mil3.3.4:1.6_2: taṇhā na hoti, taṇhāya asati upādānaṁ na hoti, upādāne asati bhavo na hoti, bhave
mil3.3.4:1.6_3: asati jāti na hoti, jātiyā asati jarāmaraṇaṁ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā na
mil3.3.4:1.6_4: honti, evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotī”ti.
